publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3114# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow Trongate Regeneration-That the Parliament pledges its full support for the campaign launched by traders in Glasgow's Trongate for the regeneration of the area; notes with concern that the area has suffered from neglect and decline in recent years whilst other parts of the city have benefited from regeneration; supports the demands of the traders for steps to be taken for the area's regeneration, including a new railway station at Glasgow Cross as part of the Glasgow CrossRail scheme, and considers that the Scottish Executive should ensure that measures are put in place to achieve the area's regeneration.
S1M-3114# Glasgow Trongate Regeneration (lodged on 15 May 2002) Michael Matheson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-3114# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow Trongate Regeneration-That the Parliament pledges its full support for the campaign launched by traders in Glasgow's Trongate for the regeneration of the area; notes with concern that the area has suffered from neglect and decline in recent years whilst other parts of the city have benefited from regeneration; supports the demands of the traders for steps to be taken for the area's regeneration, including a new railway station at Glasgow Cross as part of the Glasgow CrossRail scheme, and considers that the Scottish Executive should ensure that measures are put in place to achieve the area's regeneration. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder
S1M-3114# Glasgow Trongate Regeneration (lodged on 15 May 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3114# Glasgow Trongate Regeneration (lodged on 15 May 2002) Andrew Wilson*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S1M-3114# Glasgow Trongate Regeneration (lodged on 15 May 2002) Robert Brown*, Pauline McNeill*
S1M-3114# Glasgow Trongate Regeneration (lodged on 15 May 2002) Fiona McLeod*
